metadata.title: CVE-2024-33883 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
The ejs (aka Embedded JavaScript templates) package before 3.1.10 forNode.js lacks certain pollution protection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-33883` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-ejs - 3.1.10+~3.1.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.10+~3.1.5-1').
